articles.description: Sources briefed on the Hunter Biden investigation told CNN federal prosecutors; discussion on potential charges have been ramping up.

articles.title: Gavin Newsom signs California gun law modeled after Texas abortion ban
articles.description: Senate Bill 1327 will allow Californians to sue those who make, sell, transport, or distribute illegal assault weapons and ghost guns for damages of at least $10,000.

articles.title: Josh Hawley fist and flee would be slowest NFL Combine 40-yard dash record
articles.description: Hawley would run the dash in 7.2 seconds, according to calculations. But as it turns out, the Missouri senator still runs faster than the average man.
articles.content:

articles.title: China to launch space-station module Sunday, possible runaway rocket
articles.description: The Long March 5B rocket has launched twice before, and both times its heavy body fell back to Earth uncontrolled, drawing international outcry.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump and Biden: COVID-19 illness similarities and differences
articles.description: The early days of Biden's illness with COVID look vastly different than Trump's, but the two did share some similarities in how they communicated with the public.
articles.content:
